name: Draw Army: State Survivor
description:
Your country has been invaded by enemies. You are the commander of the army, and only you can save the city from the mob control.
Draw to place your units strategically, capture the bases one by one to save the state.
Control the army of soldiers, use all your tactical and strategic skills and defeat your opponent’s army forces playing this fantastic game!
Defeat the enemy like it's nothing with your strategic action and calculated attacks. Play to win the top war! Destroy the enemy waves, do critical strike and collect points to upgrade your units.
You are the army commander; your troops depends on you. Draw Army and lead them to victory!
Draw Army: State Survivor features:
• Amazing soldiers battlefield shooter
• Wide range of different weapons with their own characteristics
• Chance to improve your tactics and strategy skills
• Outstanding 3D graphics

From the Studio that brought you Monster Draft
developers: OREON STUDIOS OYUN YAZILIM TEKNOLOJI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: OREON STUDIOS OYUN YAZILIM TEKNOLOJI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
